name: Bad-el-Kazar

skills.name: Dark Sphere
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Heals this Champion and all allies by 20% of the damage inflicted.
skills.notes: Heal is based on total damage dealt. Fully booked increases both damage and healing.

skills.name: Malice
skills.description: Removes all debuffs from all allies. Places two 15% [Continuous Heal] buffs on all allies for 2 turns. Places two 5% [Poison] debuffs on all enemies for 2 turns.
skills.notes: 100% chance to apply poisons. Booked cooldown is 3 turns.

skills.name: Prey Upon
skills.description: All allies inflict 20% more damage against targets under [Poison] debuffs.
skills.notes: Does not increase Warmaster/Giant Slayer damage. Does not stack if multiple Bad-el-Kazars are present.

forms.aura: Increases Ally Critical Rate in all Battles by 25%
forms.comments: One of the best universal support champions. Excels in Clan Boss, dungeons, and solo content.

stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 300+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, C.DMG, RES for tank

clan_boss: No Rapid Response/Arcane Celerity in speed-tuned teams

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Generally good AI. Prioritizes cleanse and healing appropriately.

mechanics_advisory: Passive does not boost Warmaster/Giant Slayer damage. Does not stack with multiple Bad-el-Kazars. Synergizes with poisoners and teams that apply Poison debuffs.

update_notes.last_patch: Passive updated to 20% damage boost. Template-compliant JSON entry.
